options.content:
# INFO

Currently not 100% accurate. Waiting on latest cortex version to be deployed.

This dashboard displays capacity that is available for any project to use. `General available` means the capacity is not reserved for external customers or pinned to specific projects. (For those there is a separate section=)

The displayed capacity accounts for upcoming migrations from decommissioned hosts. The capacity is calculated as following:

`Available capacity on non-decommissioned hosts - Workload on decommissioned hosts / Total capacity of non-decommissioned hosts`

This is done because when a host is decommissioned, its workload must migrate to the remaining general available hosts, consuming some of their free capacity.

## Example

If you have 100 cores available on non-decommissioned hosts, but 20 cores of workload are running on decommissioned hosts that need migration, the dashboard shows 80 cores as actually available.

## Filters

**Availability Zone**: Filter by specific availability zones or view all zones.

**Compute Host**: Filter by specific hosts or view aggregated data across all hosts.

**Enabled**: Set to "true" to only count enabled hosts (excludes hosts in maintenance). Set to "All" to include both enabled and disabled hosts.

Use the pre-filtered sections below to view capacity by workload type and CPU architecture.

targets.expr:
sum(
  max by (compute_host, resource) (
    cortex_vmware_host_capacity_available{
      resource="cpu",
      availability_zone=~"$availability_zone",
      compute_host=~"$compute_host",
      workload_type="general-purpose",
      enabled=~"$enabled",
      decommissioned="false",
      external_customer="false",
      pinned_project!="true"
    }
  )
)

sum(
  max by (compute_host, resource) (
    cortex_vmware_host_capacity_total{
      resource="cpu",
      availability_zone=~"$availability_zone",
      compute_host=~"$compute_host",
      workload_type="general-purpose",
      enabled=~"$enabled",
      decommissioned="false",
      external_customer="false",
      pinned_project!="true"
    }
  )
)

sum(
  max by (compute_host, resource) (
    cortex_vmware_host_capacity_total{
      resource="cpu",
      availability_zone=~"$availability_zone",
      compute_host=~"$compute_host",
      workload_type="general-purpose",
      # Remove enabled from decommissioned workload, since usually decommissioned hypervisors are disabled
      decommissioned="true",
      external_customer="false",
      pinned_project!="true"
    }
  )
) or vector(0)

sum(
  max by (compute_host, resource) (
    cortex_vmware_host_capacity_available{
      resource="ram",
      availability_zone=~"$availability_zone",
      compute_host=~"$compute_host",
      workload_type="general-purpose",
      enabled=~"$enabled",
      decommissioned="false",

    }

)

sum(
  max by (compute_host, resource) (
    cortex_vmware_host_capacity_total{
      resource="ram",
      availability_zone=~"$availability_zone",
      compute_host=~"$compute_host",
      workload_type="general-purpose",
      enabled=~"$enabled",
      decommissioned="false",
      external_customer="false",
      pinned_project!="true"
    }
  )
)

# No Disk commitments here
sum(
  max by (compute_host, resource) (
    cortex_vmware_host_capacity_available{
      resource="disk",
      availability_zone=~"$availability_zone",
      compute_host=~"$compute_host",
      workload_type="general-purpose",
      enabled=~"$enabled",
      decommissioned="false",
      external_customer="false",
      pinned_project!="true"
    }
  )
)

# No Disk commitments here
sum(
  max by (compute_host, resource) (
    cortex_vmware_host_capacity_total{
      resource="disk",
      availability_zone=~"$availability_zone",
      compute_host=~"$compute_host",
      workload_type="general-purpose",
      enabled=~"$enabled",
      decommissioned="false",
      external_customer="false",
      pinned_project!="true"
    }
  )
)

binary.right: Total Decommissioned RAM - Available Decommissioned RAM

binary.right: Total Decommissioned Disk - Available Decommissioned Disk
